name: Code Racer
description:
Code your vehicle with a series of commands to complete various courses, tasks, stunts, and races in this physics-based brain teasing racing puzzle game!

Program your way through over 100 exciting levels featuring challenging puzzles, tight turns, big jumps, moving platforms, giant balls and more in over 30 different vehicles!



Feeling good about your skills? Compete against the world in online code races to see who's the fastest programmer!

Take on the Daily Challenge for a chance to win big and try out unique levels that you havnt unlocked yet!



Have an old or slow device? No worries, Code Racer features optimized graphics that make performance smooth on any device!

Great for kids and adults alike as an intro to a programming mind-set and STEM problem solving!
